articles.title: Recent homes sales in Greater Boston (Nov. 5)
articles.description:
ACTON 16 Silver Hill Road. One-family Colonial, built in 1979, 2,844 square feet, 9 rooms, 4 bedrooms, 4 baths, on 67,082-square-foot lot. $1,160,000 6 South St. One-family Colonial, built in 1962, 2,892 square feet, 8 rooms, 3 bedrooms, 4 baths, on 18,750-square-foot lot. $1,049,000 56 Windsor Ave. One-family antique, built in 1880, 2,724 square feet, […]

The post Recent homes sales in Greater Boston (Nov. 5) appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Recent home sales in Greater Boston highlight rising property values and demand.
16 Silver Hill Road sold for $1,160,000, reflecting strong market activity.
Local families face increased competition and higher prices in the housing market.
